summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image displays an inventory screen from a video game, focusing on a material called "Stone Spirit." It is categorized as an "Uncommon" general weapon material. The description notes that it embodies the fortitude of mountains and the spirit of rocks, and it can be used in crafting weapons. The player currently holds 1 out of a possible 999 of this item. The screen also shows other materials in the inventory and various menu options like Self-Advance, Equipment, Journal, and Settings. The player has 185 units of an unspecified currency or resource.
